description:
Effortlessly shorten lengthy web addresses with TinyURL no-code plugin. No sign-up or API key is required! Simplify sharing and remember URLs with ease. Say goodbye to long links!

Note: To make it work, use "Get data from external API" and the TinyURL-Shorten URL data call.

name: TinyURL URL Shortener
plugin_instructions: Simply install the plugin and use the TinyURL-Shorten URL data call to create tiny URLs effortlessly!
